Package com.example.snackoverflow

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeleteConfirmationFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Implements the Fragment Interaction Listener and defines the deleteObject function
    MealPlannerAddMealFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    interface for OnFragmentInteractionListener that implements mainly 3 function 1) adding a meal 2) deleting a meal 3) deleting the whole day (if no meals remaining on the day)
    RecipeIngredientFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Implements the Fragment Interaction Listener and defines the addIngredient and editIngredient function
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddEditIngredientFragment
    Add Ingredient Fragment that pops up when a user wants to add an Ingredient to the storage, edit an already present ingredient in the storage and when a user shops for ingredients in the shopping list and confims to add it to storage.
    AddRecipe
    Add Recipe Class for adding new Recipe to Recipes storage extends AppCompatActivity implements RecipeIngredientFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener implements DeleteConfirmationFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    DeleteConfirmationFragment<T>
    Delete Conformation pops up when a user wants to add an delete an Object Extends DialogFragment
    ErrorFragment
    Add Ingredient Fragment that pops up when a user makes an error Extends DialogFragment
    FirestoreDatabase
    Class storing all the Firestore Database related functionality
    Ingredient
    Ingredient class encapsulates an object for Ingredient type where it contains a title (description), best before date, location, amount, unit and category
    IngredientAdapter
    Ingredient Adapter to view the Ingredients in list view
    IngredientAdapterTest  
    IngredientDetailsActivity
    IngredientDetailsActivity defines the Activity that showcases the Ingredient details when we click on it Extends AppCompactActivity
    IngredientStorageActivity
    Ingredient Storage Activity to display the list of ingredients in the storage extends AppCompactActivity implements AddingredientFragment.OnFragementInteractionListener
    IngredientStorageTest  
    IngredientTest  
    LogoActivity
    Displays the logo at app start
    MainActivity
    The main activity or the home page of the app extends AppCompatActivity implements MealPlannerAddMeal.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Mealday
    This class stores the recipes planned/stored for the day
    MealdayAdapter
    MealdayAdapter to view the meals in ExpandableList view
    MealdayAdapter.ChildHolder
    Responsible for holding the Recycler view for expandable view.
    MealdayAdapter.ParentHolder
    Holds data displayed by the childview
    MealdayTest  
    MealPlannerAdapter
    MealPlannerAdapter to view the meals in Recycler view
    MealPlannerAdapter.ViewHolder  
    MealPlannerAddMealFragment
    A class modelling adding a meal to a Meal Planner extends DialogFragment implements AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
    MealPlannerTest  
    ModifyRecipe
    Modify Recipe Class to modify existing recipes and the ingredients present in the recipes extends AppCompatActivity implements RecipeIngredientFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener, DeleteConfirmationFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Recipe
    Recipe class encapsulates an object for the recipe type where it contains a title (description), time to prep, number of servings, category, instructions, comments, ingredients required for recipe.
    RecipeActivity
    Recipe Activity class used to display existing recipes created by the user along with images extends AppCompatActivity
    RecipeAdapter
    An adapter for Recipe Storage extends arrayAdapter
    RecipeIngredientFragment
    Add Ingredient Fragment for recipe that pops up when a user wants to add an Ingredient to the recipe Extends DialogFragment
    RecipeIngredientViewFragment
    View Ingredient Fragment that pops up when a user wants to view all Ingredient added to a recipe Extends DialogFragment
    RecipeTest  
    ShoppingListActivity
    The main activity page for shopping list.
    ShoppingListAdapter
    ShoppingListAdapter returns a view to display Ingredient objects in a user friendly, concise manner.
    ShoppingListTest  
    SortComparator
    Sort Comparator for handling sorting for Recipes, Ingredients and Shopping List
    SortComparator.BestBeforeComparator
    Best Before Comparator for Sorting by Best Before Date
    SortComparator.CategoryComparator
    Category comparator for sorting by Category
    SortComparator.LocationComparator
    Location Comparator for Sorting by Location
    SortComparator.PrepTimeComparator
    Prep Time Comparator for sorting by Prep Time
    SortComparator.ServingsComparator
    Servings comparator for sorting by Servings
    SortComparator.TitleComparator
    Title Comparator for sorting by Title
    SortComparatorTest

    Exception Description
    RecipeTest  
    ShoppingListTest
